termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions:
items: All first deposit members are entitled to this promotion.
Members are required to deposit into the Sports wallet to claim the bonus.
Promotion is subject to availability. Applicable to all aforementioned sports providers.
Bonus will be credited to your chosen Sports Provider Wallet after a successful fund transfer.
Bonuses are valid for thirty (30) days upon issuance unless stated otherwise.
Any bets resulting in void, tie, cancelled, or made on opposite sides with the same outcome will not be counted as a valid turnover.

Members who claimed the promotion for a certain provider are not allowed to make a second transfer to the same provider while the promotion is active, EXCEPT FOR members who achieved the turnover requirement or the promotion is cancelled.
All customer offers are limited to one per person, family, household, or shared address.
This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other BK8 promotions.
BK8 reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend or terminate the promotion and/or change the terms of the promotion at any time without prior notice.
Participating members must accept and comply with all terms mentioned above and those on the BK8 website.
Participating members must accept and comply with all the terms mentioned above as well as all relevant and rules and regulations stated on the BK8 website.
